name: Cyberperp
description: Cyberperp is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange built on the Iota EVM, tailored for traders seeking low swap fees and minimal price impact on trades. As a fork of GMX, Cyberperp inherits robust features and introduces specialized functionalities optimized for the Iota EVM ecosystem. This platform uniquely supports trading via a multi-asset liquidity pool, which not only facilitates trades but also rewards liquidity providers with fees from market making, swaps, and leveraged trading.
